__COMMENTS__: This WorkType named 'Poem' exists in both Mneia and MusicBrainz.

fields.name: Poem
fields.description: A poem is a literary piece, generally short and in verse, where words are usually chosen for their sound and for the images and ideas they suggest.

__COMMENTS__: This WorkType named 'Poem' exists in both Mneia and MusicBrainz.

fields.name: Poem
fields.description: A poem is a literary piece, generally short and in verse, where words are usually chosen for their sound and for the images and ideas they suggest.

__COMMENTS__: This WorkType exists only in MusicBrainz, not in Mneia, and is used to unit-test importing a WorkType

fields.name: Song
fields.description: A song is in its origin (and still in most cases) a composition for voice, with or without instruments, performed by singing. This is the most common form by far in folk and popular music, but also fairly common in a classical context ("art songs").

__COMMENTS__: This FAKE MusicBrainz WorkType is used to unit-test importing a WorkType that has a parent. None of the
WorkTypes in MusicBrainz have a parent, so we're using a fake one.
